exercises.name: Daily Wages
exercises.description: Calculate daily wage (double on Sunday)
exercises.code:
hourly_wage = float(input("Hourly wage: "))
hours = int(input("Hours worked: "))
day = input("Day of the week: ")
if day == "Sunday":
    daily = hourly_wage * hours * 2
else:
    daily = hourly_wage * hours
print("Daily wages: " + str(daily) + " euros")

exercises.name: Quadratic Formula
exercises.description: Solve quadratic equation using the quadratic formula
exercises.code:
import math

a = int(input("Value of a: "))
b = int(input("Value of b: "))
c = int(input("Value of c: "))

discriminant = b**2 - 4*a*c
root1 = (-b + math.sqrt(discriminant)) / (2*a)
root2 = (-b - math.sqrt(discriminant)) / (2*a)

print("The roots are " + str(root1) + " and " + str(root2))
